summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the west 90' of north 45' of south 136.32' of Tract 19 in Sec. 3-25-4 located east of 35th Ave. N.E. 90' north of E. 70th St. and extending 46.32' north, with respect to Use District, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-466.
